text_block_list.name: President Mukai
text_block_list.text: —— We will now hold the Sacred Equine Relay's final presentation. Are you all fully prepared?

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Ms. Mukai, I've a suggestion before we begin.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: We've sorted out who's doing what for the ceremony. … You good with watching us go through that way?

text_block_list.name: President Mukai
text_block_list.text: …… Very well. I look forward to seeing the choices you all have made on this.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Thank you! ……A'ight, friends, we off!
It was after the final presentation. The time had come to leave the camp grounds and head back to the academy.

text_block_list.name: President Mukai
text_block_list.text: —— Allow me to voice my compliments once more. I am very pleased to see that you all have proven beyond doubt that you possess the qualities required to perform as Sacred Equines.

text_block_list.name: President Mukai
text_block_list.text: Over the course of this camp, I have tested your mettle…… and you all have responded with hard work and diligence.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: …… I am curious if the reason you were willing to lend us those historic materials was because you expected us to develop an interest in learning more for ourselves.

text_block_list.name: President Mukai
text_block_list.text: …… It would have been an easy thing to simply teach you all everything from the start. However, doing so would not allow me to ascertain your qualifications as true Sacred Equines.

text_block_list.name: President Mukai
text_block_list.text: The disposition to discover and recognize, by your own volition, your roles within the Sacred Equine Relay is the most crucial quality sought of one who is to become a Sacred Equine.

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: 'Tis something I can understand now. All of my practice of rituals throughout this camp was in order to find the prayers I wished to carry by my own will.

text_block_list.name: President Mukai
text_block_list.text: …… An old friend of mine entrusted to the Sacred Equine Relay her wish for "a prosperous future to await all horsegirls in this country".

text_block_list.name: President Mukai
text_block_list.text: Please, take with you this wish of hers as well. To the future you all are running towards.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: The five of us will most certainly carry on your friend's wish.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Watch close. We're gonna fulfill our Sacred Equine duties with everything you taught us in our hearts!

text_block_list.name: President Mukai
text_block_list.text: Certainly. I wholeheartedly anticipate your performance at the ceremony.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: …… Ms. Mukai, thanks heaps for helping us during our stay!

text_block_list.name: All Together
text_block_list.text: Thank you very much!

text_block_list.name: Female Announcer
text_block_list.text: —— Late autumn, here at the Festival of Illustrious Equines… and as the curtains fall amidst the traditional accompaniments, a mysterious atmosphere suddenly envelops the grounds.

text_block_list.name: Female Announcer
text_block_list.text: It looks like the first ceremony, the "Threading of Memories", will begin shortly. Before the flames to which hoofplaques were offered earlier, a Sacred Equine has appeared.

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: (I will open the Sacred Equine Relay in front of them all with dignity and pride. True to myself, without pretense.)

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: —— After we found unity together, revisiting what I knew about the Relay, I… I learned of the feelings that I had to, the prayers that I wished to, embody.

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: I came to understand which prayers I, by being who I am, could represent…!

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: In the Threading of Memories, the wishes of bygone horsegirls are seen in the flames, this ritual seeking to let them flare up once again ——

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: The vigor by which one roars into the night beside the flames, dancing around the Precinct, drives off all horsegirls' misfortune……!

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: Bridging the past and future, driving off tragedy, safeguarding wishes, threading them together. The spark that ignites it all is the Sacred Equines' intense prayer!!

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: 'Tis now my time to become…! The conflagration of all horsegirls' prayers, a flame that shields them from harm, a Sacred Equine one with the fire!

text_block_list.name: Female Announcer
text_block_list.text: —— Her solemn dance at its end, the flames are now transferred to torches. Momentarily, she will begin her dash to the Relay's Precinct at the mountain's peak.

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: Hooooooo!!

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: —— Here we exist!! Here our presence is radiant!! Memories entwined, through me, unto the Relay's Precinct!!

text_block_list.name: Female Announcer
text_block_list.text: The Sacred Equine's gallant voice resounds through the night…! And there she goes. Torch raised, towards the Relay's Precinct!

text_block_list.name: Male Announcer
text_block_list.text: Here at the Relay's Precinct, spectators are eagerly awaiting the Sacred Equine appearing from the bottom.

text_block_list.name: Male Announcer
text_block_list.text: There she comes now! With torch raised, a Sacred Equine has dashed up the mountain!!

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: —— Haaaaaaaaaah!!!!!

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: (Burn bright, O flame! Burn high, O wishes of our forebears! Burn strong, O passion within me! Burn your guiding light into the heavens for all to follow!)

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: (For all who run in the present! All who will run in the future!! Cast away the dark clouds of suffering!!!)

text_block_list.name: Male Announcer
text_block_list.text: Look at that…! The fervor in the Sacred Equine's running dance is setting alight the whole precinct……!

text_block_list.name: Male Announcer
text_block_list.text: —— The flames carried here have now transferred to the brazier. A new Sacred Equine takes the stage for the Verse of Solace, after which the Flower Scattering will take place.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: (…… It's my turn. In honor of our illustrious predecessors.)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: …… Here we exist. Here our presence is radiant. Memories entwined, through me, spun into a tale of the "present" ——

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: To circumstance bound, to their own bodies bound, to both, in cases, bound. Ye horsegirls of old, with remorse parted from running, adrift fate's river ——

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: Your warmth remains in the prayers you have left, wishing no soul need follow you. For my own fate is bound likewise, I wish to return the comfort I have found within to you ——

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: And with my very own legs… I desire to prove your prayers have provided a future in which we still run……!

text_block_list.name: Male Announcer
text_block_list.text: —— The recital of the Verse of Solace is hereby over. Next, the Flower Scattering will take place, where gorgeous flowers will be thrown into the crowd.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: —— O prayers, open thy buds. O wishes, blossom proud. Grafted by the flames' heat, flower for the sky!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: (Like these flowers, all of us will blossom right here in the "present". Beyond hardships we will run, with these prayers our inspiration!)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: Thy dreams in florescence. Now and ever after, may thou find peace and glory on the path untraveled.
